item.title: Linux | SSL Certificate with Certbot
item.description: Requirements Debian, Apache2, Snapd, Certbot Install sudo apt update -y sudo apt install snapd -y install certbot sudo snap install certbot --classic Create symbolic link so you can run certbot command from the terminal sudo ln -s /snap/bin/certbot /usr/bin/certbot Run certbot command sudo certbot --apache you can change “–apache” to “–nginx” if you are using nginx instead of apache Getting the Cert Enter your valid email address so certbot can contact you for renewal and security notices
